title: Thousands of Sri Lankan health workers on strike
content: Health workers across Sri Lanka including nurses, and Public Health Inspectors are on strike citing multiple demands.They resorted to the indefinite trade union action from Monday (7) against the governmentâ€™s failure to remove salary anomalies and address their grievances, despite recent token strikes.As a result of the strike, Clinics, Dispensaries, Blood Tests, as well as COVID-19 testing, did not function across many government hospitals in Sri Lanka.
